doc:
Louis Wolheim https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Louis_Wolheim 0 Louis Robert Wolheim (March 28, 1880 – February 18, 1931) was an American actor, of both stage and screen, whose rough physical appearance relegated him to roles mostly of thugs or villains in the movies, but whose talent allowed him to flourish on stage. His career was mostly contained during the silent era of the film industry, due to his untimely death at the age of 50 in 1931. Louis_Robert_Wolheim ( March_28 , 1880 – February_18_,_1931 ) was an_American_actor , of both_stage_and_screen , whose_rough_physical_appearance relegated him to roles mostly of thugs_or_villains in the_movies , but whose_talent allowed him to_flourish on stage . His_career was_mostly_contained during the_silent_era of the_film_industry , due_to his_untimely_death at the_age of 50 in 1931 .
